website_summaries.verdict: This functional and stylish backpack features a handful of useful pockets and organizers, and comes in a variety of colors to choose from. A sturdy, well-built backpack that's perfect for school, or heading to the office.
pros: Features the signature striped liner on the inside
Perfect for the everyday or a vacation companion
cons: This pack isn't big enough to fit a 17-inch laptop

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm... not sure about this one
customer_reviews.text: After looking at pics of many backpacks I had high hopes for this..😶 but i became less than enthusiastic within 17 seconds after I opened the packaging. The material of this bagpack felt really... rough. But there were much more serious issues. The front compartment seemed to be defective and no amount of force could close the zipper. Also the stitching inside were ripped. I don't know.. there were reviews that said you were paying a brand premium for Herschel when compared to something like Jansport which btw i ended up buying but thats another story..🙃 maybe this unique example is a knockoff or defective or a defective knockoff?? Hmmm life's many mysteries we must muddle thru... 🤔
customer_reviews.author: SangYoon Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love Herschel but the bag started ripping on the outside ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Herschel but the bag started ripping on the outside pretty quickly which annoyed me but this is the first cheap quality Herschel product I've owned. If all of these are made like this then I would recommend a different backpack, but hopefully I just got unlucky with this backpack. For the price, that rip should not have happened without rigorous use which is my reasoning for a 4 star. I still use it regardless of the rip and has held up well other than that. Nice that it has a laptop pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Kapiloff

customer_reviews.title: Favorite travel backpack for certain airlines and flights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my Miami trip flying Sun Country airlines from Minnesota. High quality backpack, water proof. Fit perfectly under their seat so I didn't have to pay for a carry on or a checked bag. Has a good amount of room. Love the sleeve to protect my laptop. Saved me so much money. $119 round trip! (after seat selections) The zippers were a bit stiff to move but wasn't difficult to move like everyone says in their reviews. Overtime it will break in. For all the negative reviewers about the zipper, for how much you type I thought your fingers would be strong enough.. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: so I assumed it was nice as it wouldn't get damaged so easily
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY. The material of the backpack is extremely thick, so I assumed it was nice as it wouldn't get damaged so easily, but it hurts my skin. If I don't have something covering my whole back, this causes itchiness and it feels so uncomfortable. zippers are the worst part, so hard to deal with them that I doubt it will last longer than a month without tearing them apart. I feel like this is a fake herschel because it feels so bad that I don't think they are the cause of my suffering.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. A

customer_reviews.title: 3 Years Strong
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack nearly 3 years ago. It has held up nicely. I'm very impressed with the quality and always liked the simplicity, size and shape. The laptop sleeve is very soft and the inside stripes were a nice touch. The only problem I've had with it is the fact that the front zipper (which was once white) has began to yellow. Not sure why. Maybe it was the fabric they chose. I carried this bag to school, across the country, and have taken it to different continents. It is a great bag and has served me well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Poor pricetag
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've gotten, and I really like them. The quality of materials is great. The old one I had lasted about 5 years and still looked pretty darn good considering I used it every single day. Sadly, the zipper for the larger of the two front pockets came off. After repeated use, the fabric at the base of the zipper ripped and when I went to close it, the zipper closed completely and then the actual zipper fell right off. 4 Stars since they're kind of expensive and I thought it would last even longer considering the price and quality. But still a backpack that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy Herschel again.
customer_reviews.text: After buying 10 laptop viable bags and returning 8 of them this is #1 of 2 that I kept. It's a little bit simple and basic, I don't know if I would like it so much if I didn't have organizer inserts. But it safely fits my laptop, compact mechanical keyboard, two mice, mousepad, power brick, compact laptop stand, several dongles, a few spare cords and my little vape bag just fine. I love the revamped classic design, and after a few weeks of use it appears to be very well built. I especially like the leather reinforced bottom and handle that came in my particular design.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Zippers...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice backpack but I would say it's overpriced for what you're getting. The zippers are especially frustrating because they are often difficult to dig out from underneath the fabric lips that cover them. The size is ideal but sometimes feels a little shallow. Overall it's not a bad backpack if you're looking for something with a little more style, but if size and functionality is your primary concern I would spend your money on something like a Jansport or Swiss Gear.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: High quality backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Always love the Herschel brand and the products they put out. One thing for folks to be aware of is that they make their products to last, so you will need to wear in the zippers and flaps a bit before it starts behaving nicely when unzipping and zipping the pouches. I have to ‘power through it’ when zipping, but am noticing its wearing in and holding its shape very well. This is no Jansport teenager backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Zippers are hard to open but the overall bag is well made and holds more than you think. I like the simplicity and straightforwardness of the bag and that it feels sturdy and substantial compared to other cheaper bags. I did not get the faux-leather bottom; I think this bag looks better with the nylon saddle brown bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Blueberrytoys

customer_reviews.title: Great and trendy bag with some downsides
customer_reviews.text: Herschel bags are always my favorite bags when it comes to their very simple, trendy style. However this version of their backpacks have plenty of compartments on the front and also a very very thick an soft flap for laptops in the main pocket. The bag is also overall pretty large and holds a ton of items. The downside to me using bags like these is that the bottom tends to get dirty very easily, and because it’s a leather in the design I chose, it will definitely rip and deteriorate much faster than other bags. However, it doesn’t bother me that much and I’ll still be happy to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Fahim Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, uncomfortable, but durable and good-looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice backpack. Has pockets, very sturdy, nice interior and protective covering for my laptop. However, it’s so uncomfortable to wear. Whether it’s because it’s brand new or because of the way the backpack is, I have back pain whenever I use it. I had to haul around heavy books and this just made it so uncomfortable to walk around campus I ended up resorting back to my old backpack. I still have this backpack, it’s now a storage unit for my other bags but maybe it just needs to be broken in more. My only wish is that this had water bottle holders, too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Marron

customer_reviews.title: In love with my backpack! (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: I love my Herschel bag! Got this for school and it’s very durable. The zippers are a little tough to operate at first but I’ve been told you just need to break it in. Never wash it, and if you have to just hang dry. Updated: The zippers are extremely difficult to move and I thought after some time it would just break in but I was wrong. The zipper didn't break in, but it did BREAK. Not sure if this is an authentic purchase but if anyone has any advice it would be appreciated. Might have to take it to a local seamstress to repair even though this shouldn't have been the case. Should have stuck with Jansport lol
customer_reviews.author: Rian H

customer_reviews.title: Premium in the inside and outside.
customer_reviews.text: Not only the quality of this bag is amazing, but is very resistent. I use it to transport my Macbook Pro of 13'', my nintendo 3DS and some books times to times when i go work outside my home. Even if i wanted to take my laptop of 15'', i will not have any problems. The exterior looks amazing, but inside is very premium too. I totally recomend it, especially this color! :D
customer_reviews.author: David Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice, spacious backpack with enough compartments. I was excited to find something simple yet functional but I was disappointed. Upon putting it on I felt the internal mesh of the straps bothering me, it was very rough. The zippers drove me crazy since they were all really hard to open, even the very front pocket. It was a battle to open the backpack everytime. It must have a been a combination of the zippers and the actual backpack material being very stiff. I had to return it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Yeri Viveros

customer_reviews.title: Does It's Job - A little hard to zip
customer_reviews.text: I use it for college, it's pretty durable. When it does rain, you can see the dark spots where it does get wet but so far I haven't had anything in my bag get wet. The other thing that might put some people off is that the zippers require more attention and a little strength when zipping. One-handed zipping only works for the smallest pocket at the top of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I Like this backpack alot. Simple and sharp. It would have been nice to have extra compartments on the big bag. But over all, a great brand. I dont really like branding on my accessories or clothing, But this one has such character. I cant say if its good on water resistance. I bought this for work, but i would not mind takimg this on trips. And as far as durability have friends who swear by this brand. So i take their word for it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: I think the Herschel bags are pretty well built
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a gift for my wife, and she loves it. I think the Herschel bags are pretty well built; some things can be improved, like making pockets more useful and accessible. I have a Little America bag which I love, bought it when it first came out, there have been some pockets in the inside of the bag that I cannot use because they are too small for what they are intended. However, my wife loves her bag; she says it is versatile and functional, without taking away from being stilish.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Okay. Not great.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is fine. It’s not as roomy as I’d like and the zippers recede and are tricky to get to. Seems like good quality so far but I wouldn’t buy it again. Disclaimer: I’m a road warrior and my backpack needs to have a little space.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Casual EDC Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy backpack. Picked this up for a casual EDC pack. Plenty of pockets, seams are sturdy. I load it up in my work truck everyday, and take it with me most weekends. Has a laptop sleeve, and enough space to carry a select amount of hand tools and other bags.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Raymer

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS.
customer_reviews.text: Alright I’m just gonna say it. This backpack makes you walk different. It makes you walk with more confidence!!!!! With your head held up high. Knowing you’re just going to stunt on all your classmates. I’m not getting paid for this review but damn I should cause this is the best backpack I’ve ever had. It hold my MacBook perfectly and has pockets for everything. It’s so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack!
customer_reviews.text: Really well built back pack. I love the way it looks, and the dedicated laptop sleeve with micro fiber cloth lining. So much thought and detail was put into it and a great and stylish back pack was born. The zippers are somewhat tough to open and close. Zipping and unzipping will almost always require two hands. Other than that, it’s exceptional and I will gladly recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Zipper & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bag and like some other reviews suggest, the front pocket zipper is poorly designed. After a few months of use, the stitching came undone and subsequently the zipper came detached (see photos). I contacted customer service expecting this to be covered under warranty only to find out that because I bought through a third party seller via Amazon, the warranty is void. No where on this listing does it suggest that the warranty is void if you purchase (by design I'm sure). Now I feel cheated after spending over $60 for a backpack that lasted me less than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Valtierra

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful backpack. The white one with blue stripes was ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful backpack. The white one with blue stripes was on sale I'm assuming because it's kind of a weird color. Since buying it I often get compliments. Two downsides, the color is more subject to getting dirty. I'm looking for some products to protect against stains but have found no info on Hershcel's website. Secondly, my previous Herschel pop quiz backpack had like an iPad compartment attacked to the laptop one and like these little sections inside the main compartment where you could put your charger and other things, this backpack lacks this. It only has the laptop compartment and then a couple organizational dividers on the little front pouch
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and practical.
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday. It’s my work backpack. I have a 15” laptop in it and it fits. It’s a thinkpad it’s thick and durable and it still fits. Comfortable and looks great. And durable. I’ve spilled hot coffee on this and I sling it over my shoulder roughly sometimes. I’ve crammed too much crap into it and loaded it with tools. I packed in it once for an emergency trip out of state and it tends to spend it’s time in dust filled construction sites so I’d say it’s pretty dam durable. I love it def worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Straw Hat

customer_reviews.title: A total steal at $42
customer_reviews.text: A bit narrower than my previous bag, but holy ****, what a pretty, well-crafted things this is. It's like the Kate Moss of backpacks. Those curves, baby. Wow. And the instant hipster cred I know I'm getting as a result of it feels so empowering. Aside from that, the zippers are solid and there's a soft-lined pocket specifically for sunglasses at the top of the bag which is surprisingly functional. Never thought I'd need such a thing, but now that it's there, I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Saucy Intruder

customer_reviews.title: excellent backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack been using it for the past 3 semesters and not a single tear or rip, unlike my past cheap backpacks. this has enough room for my 15 inch laptop in the laptop sleeve, a few textbooks and a notebook. Feels very good quality, the shoulder straps are padded too so I never get sore shoulders from carrying this around even when I have my fat programming textbook, my laptop and other school supplies in it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Small but solid
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good backpack although the key holder on the front pocket is way to hard. Other than that it is a solid small backpack. Would like to see a side nest or something for a water bottle since the backpack is small and the bottle takes a lot of space from the main compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Jasiel

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the bag looks and how it's constructed ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the bag looks and how it's constructed but the plastic zippers proved almost impossible to work. They are extremely stiff and hard to pull and getting the zipper around the corners of the front pocket was almost impossible. I had to return the bag. I can't fuss with waiting (and hoping) the zippers will loosen up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Stef J

customer_reviews.title: Great looking backpack/day pack/carry-on.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend. He loves it. Only concern is zippers are tight at first, which is on par for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J Germelman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, but sticky zipper
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality backpack that I bought for my college-aged daughter. She likes the pocket size/location and laptop pocket. her only gripe is that the zippers only pull from one side, and are very stiff. we assume this is due to them being water resistant, but it means she can't open them with one hand very easily while it is still on her shoulder. And closing them with one hand is out of the question. Giving 3 stars for the pain in the butt factor, if the zippers were better then 5 for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carpentier

customer_reviews.title: ... that maybe I would arrive with some defect or bad quality but when I received the package all change
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that at first I was very hesitant about buying it since some of the buyers had a common complaint that was that the backpack was not original I took the risk and bought it thinking that maybe I would arrive with some defect or bad quality but when I received the package all change, the backpack for the price that you are paying is of very good quality the materials are of very good quality the backpack itself is very good and to that we add that it looks very good. I have no complaints I use every day and I am more than happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Very durable and looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured including color. My son can be tough as he goes from class to clsss. Track, cross country, a few different clubs. Then dumpd it and uses it as an overnight bag. He has twice taken it as his carry on to visit family across the country. I am very pleased with how durable yet pleasing to the eye! Being cool is important at 17. Also, I paid half price what the name department store was asking! LOVE IT! I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: MsBrenda

customer_reviews.title: Carries everything, including a 6-pack
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sleek backpack for work that would be able to lug all my life's essentials. It does that perfectly. Shoulder straps are nicely padded, enough compartments without going overboard, minimal design. It is quite spacious, enough to comfortably carry a six pack. If you're going for a cute look, it might be better to go with the smaller version of this.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Hearts

customer_reviews.title: The size of the laptop sleeve is defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought two backpacks Navy and black one. Both are good except one (black) being defective. The black one is for my brother and we both have the same size laptops but my brother cannot fit his laptop on the his backpack (black) which is really annoying although I can easily fit his laptop on my (Navy) backpack. I personally didn't expect from this brand to have such problem. It was a present from me to my brother but having seen that his backpack is defective he is really upset right now.
customer_reviews.author: Nodir

customer_reviews.title: Great travel backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great Travel backpack as I use it for all my traveling. I used to use it for work, but then I wanted a more professional backback as I work in a more conservative industry (didn't want to look too young). This backback is made with great quality and has held up for over 5 years with no tears but some scuffs. I love hershel as the look is classic and goes along with all different types of uses and outfits.
customer_reviews.author: TCH92

customer_reviews.title: Zippers could be better
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack but zippers are annoying. Very difficult to zip open and closed around corners, such as the front square pouch. Literally, I feel like I am going to break the zipper every time. Also, the fabric lip covering the zippers is very large and stiff. Could be better
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: Great daily backpack especially for the city
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack that is portable and easily stowed away under airline seats. It has enough pockets for a city backpack so I am perfectly fine with it. I took off a star because it lacks a water bottle pouch and for some reason, the zippers take a LONG time to break in. It's so stiff but after a month of using it, it is now easy to zip and unzip.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack the color it self gets a lot of attention. I used this as a travel bag but it’s not too spacious. I also experience a rainy day in Chicago and it got super wet and it dried out and didn’t damage the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Bryant Villatoro

customer_reviews.title: We love this backpack.
customer_reviews.text: We love this backpack. We use it as our diaper bag because most "real" diaper bags look so frumpy. This backpack looks really cool. Nice, sharp lines and quality construction. This one has a nice, neutral grey exterior with a fun pink/red candy-striper look on the inside. Perfect for our needs and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Reid

customer_reviews.title: I really like this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack. The material is of good quality, its stylish. It has a retro like with a moden spin. It's big enough for my 14+ inches laptop, charger, mouse, ipad, guns, ammos, taser, pens, water bottle etc.. I like the design and it's pretty and lightweight to carry around. It's a good buy for me. Only complaint is: It's made in China and I hate things that are made in China. That's just my Patriotism kicking in. Anyway. buy it. if you are a Made in USA only guy, skip this and but from Kletterwerks. Otherwise, this should not disappoint you. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koskinen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love Herschel backpacks! I've never used better ones so far. I had to toss my other Herschel backpack-- the one with the waterproof cap and draw strings, because the strings are getting really worn and ugly within a few years of use. But since everything else lasted really well on that bag, I bought this one. I really love the lined section for Macbooks or iPads. It kept me from scratching my electronics. I also love the compartments-- I love everything about this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: Holes in the bag after fewer than 2 full months of ownership
customer_reviews.text: Herschel bags look great, but their material quality and durability have gone way downhill. I've owned this backpack since mid-June with ordinary daily use for my commute to work (i.e. no outdoor adventures or situations in which the material could be damaged) and the bag has already gotten several holes in its exterior. I used to be able to rely on Herschel as a symbol of high quality. Now, it's just like every other large brand: you pay for the label, not for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It's light, but it fits. The non-layer inside the bag is very much, can meet all kinds of needs, want to install what to install what, no matter be water cup or computer, have corresponding place. He loaded a lot of things, and his big shoulder strap could be adjusted, which was also very comfortable to carry. I walked for a whole day, but I felt no tired at all. The color of this bag is also very beautiful, it looks very clean and looks very classy, although its price is really preferential.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Penen

customer_reviews.title: First Herschel Backpack
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this Backpack!! This is the first Herschel Backpack Ive purchased, and Im extremely satisfied! I especially love the sunglasses pocket. Couple of things to note: 1. Built-In Laptop sleeve is soft and gentle! I have a hardshell case on my Macbook Pro 13in w/ TouchBar and it fits perfectly. But if you have a sleeve for your laptop separately, it will not fit in the built-in one. 2. The bag is smaller than I expected, but am able to fit 2 books, Mesh Pencil bag, Set of markers and Laptop accessories without looking over stuffed. Overall, The product arrived promptly, perfect condition, and is exactly what was described.
customer_reviews.author: NikitaC90

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy backpack but not designed to carry enough.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy backpack. Unfortunately , it’s not meeting my daughter’s needs this year in 8th grade . Her locker is so far from any of her classes, that she needs to carry everything around with her all day. This backpack does not have the space to do that. It’s also disappointing that it does not have pockets on the sides for a water bottle or an umbrella. It loses a star just for missing that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Lo

customer_reviews.title: I bought these beautiful backpack 4 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought these beautiful backpack 4 years ago, but I never used because it was a present for my daughter. And she wanted to wait until high school. Well today she used the pack for the first time. And all the leather is broken!!!!! I’m so so sad because I always thought this part of bag was real leather but it seems is not real. It’s an expensive and a very good brand backpack. I’m very sad and disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Mazzone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and a very nice color that's hard to get outside!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! This is my second Pop Quiz from Herschel and the main reason I've replaced the first one was due to its leather all coming apart. It sucks but it was also common among all Herschel products that have​ leather. Gladly, I think they've realized the design flaw and start releasing designs without the leather! This bag is one of them, and without the leather, I'd suppose the bag would last quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Lim

customer_reviews.title: All the features of a tech bag but actually looks good.
customer_reviews.text: needed a bag for school but also to protect my laptop. I can tell you this does both very well. there is a nice soft to touch felt like material where a laptop goes, also built very well. Zippers are high quality with a lot of space for everything. Now if you were looking for a battery, don’t bother going for the ones built into the bags, just spend $10-20 on a nice battery bank that will save you time and your back.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M.

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY GET A JANSPORT
customer_reviews.text: Item came in scratched up and leather was wrinkled up. DO NOT BUY THIS BAG. Also after a month the white zipper turns yellow and looks horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: ... year ago and for the most part I really liked it. The material of the backpack is very ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack about a year ago and for the most part I really liked it. The material of the backpack is very good quality and durable. There are many pockets which I love. The only thing that bothered me about the backpack was how hard it was to use the zippers. They did not zip very smoothly. I don't know if it was only the backpack I received or if all Herschel backpacks are like this but that was the only noticeable thing that really bothered me since it made the backpack difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, the texture and everything. Only downside will be that the zipper is a bit hard to open and close unless the opening is well aligned. It's not super tough but something you'll notice when trying to get to your bag in a hurry
customer_reviews.author: Seo Young Myaeng

customer_reviews.title: Herschel = Quality
customer_reviews.text: Herschel makes some of the best quality stuff on the market today. Seriously, everything they make lasts YEARS. This backpack is freaking rad, perfect size, fit, nice and soft inside, bunch of random pockets for everything, and of course the quality is prime. Spend the extra $ and get Hershel, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: oja7

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backpack I've ever had. I lost my old one after a year and immediately bought it again. Other people gave it poor reviews, but it's because they failed to notice they were buying this "Mid-Volume" model. As a college student, I quite like this size. It comfortably fits my 13" laptop (in the sleeve) and my notebooks.
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Where is water bottle pocket?
customer_reviews.text: Most expensive book bag we have bought. When packing up school stuff, realized it had no outside pocket for a water bottle. All book bags, over the years, far cheaper, have had an pocket on left ad right for water. Here, school requires a bottle water daily.
customer_reviews.author: uniquebuys 54

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bagpack but holy cow is it narrow on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bagpack but holy cow is it narrow on the inside! Not fit for middle schoolers nor high schoolers. My kid has been carrying his binder outside of his bagpack because it doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Bagpacks I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: This bag has held up very well over the 6 or so months I've owned it. The inside of the bag is very high quality. There is a pocket flap where you can fit a laptop, probably up to a 13 inch. The small pocket in the front is pretty big and has another pocket in the back. The straps are comfortable. Even with a laptop and a few books the bag is comfortable to wear. I love how compact the bag seems but can fit more than I need. I have used it for college and short trips. Will definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Picture is a lie - no leather on the Black/Black bag - maybe not really a Herschel
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black/black model and the picture shows leather on the bottom but that is not what I received. Makes me think that it's not really a Herschel but I bought it directly from Amazon. Not what I expected for the price so I feel that I got ripped off. So back into the box it went and going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: gt3347

customer_reviews.title: Great for looks, Pretty good for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Great for fashion, however slightly less efficient than other backpacks in terms of functionality. The seams that cover the zippers make it a little harder to open/close, but it's not a dealbreaker for me. Another thing I like is the waterproof front pocket, the soft sunglasses pocket, and the soft laptop pocket. Overall high-quality craftsmanship with multiple pockets.
customer_reviews.author: @_Calender

customer_reviews.title: Great for High School
customer_reviews.text: Upon first ordering this backpack, I was skeptical about whether it would fit all of my school supplies. I've been using it for months now and have been really satisfied. It's sturdy and spacious, as well as comfortable to carry. My backpack can fit these items: -Two 1" binders, -Three folders, -Three spirals, -One water bottle, -One lunchbox, and -One pencil pouch. Would highly recommend this practical backpack for students!
customer_reviews.author: web

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking & Great Quality Camo Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Woodland Camo/Multi Zip backpack for my 2nd grader and both my son and I absolutely loved it. He's totally into military and patriotic things so this was perfect. The quality is great too. Colors are nice and strong. The backpack is better looking in person. I was afraid it would be too big for him but it was perfect. I almost bought it at Nordstrom for $75 before checking on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and is able to hold my 13' laptop
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was everything I was looking for. It is very sturdy and is able to hold my 13' laptop, several notebooks, and a textbook or two (though I don't consistently use it for that much very often). I love the soft-lined laptop sleeve and sunglasses holder, and the two pockets in the front are perfect for holding a calculator and a whole bunch of pens and pencils. I got it in a burgundy damask color and have used it for about 6 months now and the color has not shown any dirt or stains on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: A classic style on a bag that is built to last. The bag definitely has a steep price tag for someone like a college student, such as myself. But, I can tell after about a month of ownership that this bag is ready for the long haul every piece of the bag is sturdy and feels amazingly tough. The zippers are quality as well as every pocket. There is a small, cushiony pocket made for a phone or sunglasses, and it does its job superbly. Everything about this bad is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack! Bought for a preschooler because he needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Bought for a preschooler because he needed a full size bag and he chose this color- lots of pockets and a laptop sleeve inside- 4 stars only because it's a little heavy for him with all the added little pockets and dividers but all in all a great backpack that I'm hoping to have for several years!
customer_reviews.author: Tillia P

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty durable and really cute
customer_reviews.text: I put a whole bunch of books in it plus my laptop. I honestly thought it was going to break and was pleasantly surprised when it didn't. It's pretty durable and really cute, I'm happy with my purchase. Update: it's been over three years now and it's still going strong. Nothing's chipping or peeling, no tearing. I've used it for school and overnight trips. It's pretty comfortable. It's one of the best, worth the price. Only issue I'd say I actually have is that I wish it had a water bottle holder but that's not the bags fault and there are ways to get around that.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8th grader who told me this is the equivalent to a Jansport back in my day. The material feels durable and out has all the right pockets. Perfect for school. I’d say it’s a bit small for travel, but very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert bullock

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's fine and my daughter can carry plenty of books as ...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic zipper broke after second school year of use. The white has also yellowed over time. Other than that it's fine and my daughter can carry plenty of books as well as her 15" laptop in it. No fraying or seam problems on the rest of the back pack despite using it in the rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: TriSportChick

customer_reviews.title: On the go backpack
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for an everyday backpack, then this is the one. Well made and perfect for every single item you use while you’re out doing everyday errands. Keeps me organized while I’m on the go, only thing missing is a water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: BurbankJ

customer_reviews.title: I love it, Boyfriend does not.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my boyfriend who used it for a while but then bought a new back pack and gave it to me because he hated the zippers on this one.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect daily commuter pack!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack. I was searching for days for a new laptop backpack and I was leaning towards some of the more "Technical" packs. But when it was all said and done I ended up landing on this bag. I can say that there is plenty of space for all my daily carry items to my office, as well as a beautiful laptop sleeve for my massive 15.6 in laptop. This bag is stylish, has plenty of space, and is built to last. I will be a Herschel customer for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: Did not last at all! Usually a backpack this price will last you 7-8 years, more if you take care of it... This was mot the case. IDK why I had such high hopes, but I’m surely disappointed on it only lasting 1 year...
customer_reviews.author: Laura Chahin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for school. It looks great and is just as shown in the picture. However, it has only been in use for 1 week and it already has loose threads, which makes me disappointed because my old backpack ($30) had been in use for 1 year and had never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Xia Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but a bit cramped for school books
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, sturdy, and has lots of useful pockets. Nice lining too. But it's just too small to carry more than a couple binders and one text book in my opinion. If you tend to bring home a lot of text books or have lots of thick 3-ring binders, you should consider the full-sized Herschel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Fanatic in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Stylish= Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookbag! I love the style of the Herschel Brand and this bookbag doesn't disappoint. I bought it for college and it holds everything I need and looks very nice. I like the cloth or felt lined top pocket that holds and protects from my sunglasses from being scratched. Also, the laptop sleeve is the same material as the top pocket and holds my Surface RT perfectly. The front pocket (the one behind the white zipper pocket) has a lot of individual pockets and pen holders that nicely organize everything I have. I'm really satisfied with my purchase, I bought this back in January 2014 and it's still in almost perfect condition now September 2014.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, use it mostly to travel. Preferred it for many pockets. Only thing missing is a wattle bottle pouch!
customer_reviews.author: AngDess

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack I have ever owned. Love the size and the small pocket near the handle. Many uses when travelling. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K Mauchline

customer_reviews.title: Herschel makes great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Great Backpack! Herschel makes great products! I use the Pop Quiz a lot! (I might have 6 other colors . . don't judge me) I pack: MacBook Pro Charger Mouse Keyboard Trackpad Headphones Notebook Pens 5 Hour Energy And I still have extra room. These are great, sturdy backpacks! Herschel is a great company!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Only gripe is the zippers
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice product, only complaint would be the zippers for it is somewhat hard to open and close, for the price point wish the zipper was made with better materials.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: And it is sturdy and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This held a lot more than I thought it would! And it is sturdy and looks good. I love the lined sunglass pocket! The whole reason I bought the Pop Quiz bag was for the protected laptop compartment! The front pockets are an added bonus so many pockets inside it is amazing! I do wish it had a pocket on the side for water bottles but I can live without it. I highly recommend this bag. Will update again in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this backpack everyday for almost a year now and no zippers or seams have broken! Great quality backpack, has all the pockets I need. I love the material on the inside laptop pocket, makes me feel safe putting my more expensive electronics there. Could use a bit padding on the bottom, but haven't had a problem at all with it. Love this bag
customer_reviews.author: Janbro Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: My EDC bag that can hold a ton! Just wish it had a bottle holder on the outside!
customer_reviews.author: KQuillz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 15" MacBook Pro and leaves plenty of room. Super comfortable and super stylish. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This backpack had a great looking outside that's was great... But the problem was that the backpack is way too small. I was gonna use it for highschool but it could barely fit a 2in binder and a book in the main compartment
customer_reviews.author: Angel S

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend he loves it. It’s a little on the smaller side but still nice classic look
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I also love that the second pocket has organizational pockets for pens ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has lasted me such a long time without ripping or showing any sign of distress. There's plenty of room for books and such and a very padded laptop compartment. I also love that the second pocket has organizational pockets for pens and such. There is also a small pocket on top with protective lining that's great for glasses and other small valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Abeyta

customer_reviews.title: compliments every time
customer_reviews.text: Great product, always get compliments. Use it everyday, and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: leilani reyes

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong backpack
customer_reviews.text: Not only was the backpack i got FAKE??? I received the WRONG ONE! I ordered a black Herschel with the gray zipper, received one with a white zipper. The one i ordered costs more. I’ve had multiple Herschel’s throughout these past years, noticed right away, these are not original. Authentic ones cost exactly the same, maybe even less if you go to their website. Thank you for giving me the wrong one! And a replica, too.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for commuting
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It’s a little stiff at first. The material gets softer with time. Love the green color in and laptop section.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Durability! Great durable fabric!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses it for 8th grade and has enough room, yet compact enough so the booksack is not bulky or uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: bookreader

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because I like the fleeced lined laptop pocket in the main compartment ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I like the fleeced lined laptop pocket in the main compartment as well as the little pocket for your sunglasses. The laptop compartment is roomy since I place a Microsoft pro 3 in there. The material is stiffer and provides more structure than my jansport. My only disappointment is that there aren't any tassels on the zippers to help u grip the zippers and open/close the bag smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently under my first semester of college and this backpack is perfect. It says the laptop sleeve only holds 13" but it was able to fit my 15.6'' Asus laptop. The quality is great and there's nothing really to not like about this backpack! I definitely recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Normanjay Z.

customer_reviews.title: and the front pouch has some good little pockets for organizing stuff
customer_reviews.text: I wish the padded laptop section was removable, because I usually don't travel with a laptop anymore, and I bet a lot of people don't now (with tablets and blue tooth keyboards). Also the fabric zippers are VERY stiff, but I suppose that will work itself out with time. Very cute though, and the front pouch has some good little pockets for organizing stuff. Overall I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: TXODork

customer_reviews.title: I really like this back pack
customer_reviews.text: I really like this back pack. It has plenty of room for my 13in macbook pro with a case over it. Honestly though you don't need a case because the laptop sleeve is very nice with a fleece like covering. With my macbook I can also easily fit two text books with a note book and all my pencils and power cords. The leather on the bottom is good quality and will keep it from tearing. The whole backpack is built well.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack, except the fabric over the zippers
customer_reviews.text: All around a great backpack. I use it for work, and it has plenty of room for my 15" MacBook Pro and everything else I need. It's very sturdy, doesn't feel cheap. The simple gray design is exactly what I was looking for. My only complaint is that the two main compartment zippers have a lip of fabric over them that makes it difficult to open and close. You can fold the lip back to make it easier, but I find it just gets in the way. I think, though, that most Herschel bags (and other brands) have that lip, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Simmonds

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend....
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No complaints with this backpack. I use it to carry around my laptop and random other things for work. It gets the job done for my relatively light use. Pros: -Comfortably fits my 15" laptop -Plenty of pockets for storage -Sturdy straps -Easy to adjust straps -Durable -Plenty of space -Stylish Cons: -Straps are a bit stiff at first -Zippers are a bit stiff (may loosen up over time?)
customer_reviews.author: Shaad

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this backpack for about a week. It is just uncomfortable and just way too heavy..My shoulders always ache after wearing this backpack :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot. Many pockets including lap top sleeve and sunglass case holder (or whatever). Only thing I don't like is the zippers get caught on the square edges.
customer_reviews.author: Ipomo

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Durable, well made made backpack for my high school daughter. The color is rich and vibrant. The cool part are the pockets for electronics that have a soft felt-like lining inside for protection. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm a middle-aged mom and I wanted a modern backpack. After a lot of research I bought this one and I love it. I get compliments. I used it as a carry-on while traveling and it was perfect. I love the pockets. The laptop sleeve is nice. The whole bag is durable. The only downside is the cup holder inside is too small. I don't use it but would like one that's usable. Meh, I just carry my water bottle or store it inside with all my other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Banana lover

customer_reviews.title: Impossible zippers!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with how difficult the zippers, mainly on the front pocket, were to open, and even harder to zip closed. Wouldn’t recommend. Returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Jones

product_meta.title: Herschel Pop Quiz Backpack
product_meta.description: Well equipped for school and work, the Pop Quiz backpack features a versatile range of storage pockets and organizers.
feature_bullets: Padded and fleece lined 15 inch laptop sleeve
Front pocket with internal mesh organizers and key clip
